meanings.definition: Decapods: a group of crustaceans with ten legs, including crabs, lobsters, and shrimp.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium had a tank full of colorful decapods like crabs and shrimp.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study decapods to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: At the seafood restaurant, the decapods were having a dance-off.
meanings.sent4: In the underwater world, decapods rule the ocean floor with their ten legs.
meanings.sent5: Children love to watch decapods scuttling around in the sand at the beach.

meanings.sent1: The decapods creatures in the story had unique abilities with their ten legs.
meanings.sent2: The decapods insects moved gracefully with their ten legs in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent3: The decapods parade at the zoo was a sight to behold with all the creatures marching in unison.
meanings.sent4: The decapods robots in the movie were unstoppable with their ten legs propelling them forward.
meanings.sent5: The decapods aliens from the distant planet amazed scientists with their ten-legged bodies.
